gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 127, Bulls 92
gameRecap.excerpt: Dallas defeats Chicago, 127-92. For Dallas, Luka Doncic led the way recording his 17th triple double of the season, seventh consecutive, and 73rd of his career with 27 points (six 3PM), 12 rebounds, and 14 assists while aided by Dereck Lively II (22 points, seven rebounds, two steals, two blocks) and Daniel Gafford (20 points, seven rebounds, 9-9 FG) in the victory. Onuralp Bitim finished with 17 points and five rebounds with DeMar DeRozan tallying 13 points for Chicago in the losing effort. Dallas improves to 37-28, while Chicago moves to 31-34 in the loss.
